name: Dark Magician
author: Tobeshodges
notes:
2 Months in the Discord and my first 2 KOG - I'm starting to like this place 
Haven't got the second Ancient Rules so Tech'd in 'Spell Shield Type-8' which actually came in clutch with Arkana's Ability to give extra spells.
The deck struggles against Glads and Hazy of course, runs ok into burn - good against Dinos and AG. Thanks Guys
